DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of arm retraction on the supraclavicular approach for subclavian vein catheterization in adults and children.
DOC.brief_title: Influence of Arm Retraction on the Supraclavicular Approach for Subclavian Vein Catheterization
DOC.criteria: patients undergoing general anesthesia regardless of subclavian venous catheterization patients with infection over the puncture site history of thoracic surgery or clavicular fracture vascular malformation anatomical abnormality of subclavian vein
